channel.title: Please Help me with my no-ip
channel.description:
Hi,Im a good Coder and i like coding. i like to realesse my server BUT if i realesse it no body would like to join because im using HAMACHI! I have a NO-IP but when i open the server all work fine after i open my client and all work fine and after i login and it wont it say: ''error connecting to server'' and in my source it say: ''connection reset Null Disconnected (Artembatutin-PC.gateway.2wire.net'' Information: OS:Windows 7 Internet:Im using wirlesse connection Router:2wire RG2701HG-G (Unlocked And Portforwarded , I think so because i use the PFport checker tool and it say OPEN) NO-IP version:3.0.4 If need more Information ask and plzzz help me i need realy some help and if you want you can be admin or Co-Owner of my server my server is 317 too
Plzz help!!! :| :confused: :(
And sorry if i did something wrong in rules

item.title: Please Help me with my no-ip
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

I Vain I:

Client might not be compatible.

Im using PK planet so you would say so the client is not for no-ip?

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help me with my no-ip

item.source: Please Help me with my no-ip

item.title: Please Help me with my no-ip
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]If you’re running the server, make a few copies of the client. (YourClient, NetworkClient, and AllClient)

In “YourClient” make the IP connect to localhost.
In “NetworkClient” make it connect to your IPv4 address (if you have other people on your network that want to play)
In “AllClient” make the IP connect to ‘‘quadro7.no-ip.biz’’[/quote]
ok but why it say

conection reset
Null disconnected (MY pc name)

Microscape can you w8 10 min i will comme back and i will add you on msn ok?

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help me with my no-ip

artem i will help via teamviewer

item.title: Please Help me with my no-ip
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Whoever is running the server connects to localhost.

Anyone else on your network connects to your IPv4 address.

Everyone else will connect to the Hamachi/No-IP.[/quote]
So you want to tel me to connect to localhost and after all the player will conect to my IPV4 ip or how i set it up ppllzz help im not realy good at hosting

so i put my client for me to localhost and client for other player to quadro7.no-ip.biz (NO-IP)?

Read full topic
